node.display_long_description:
Racket: Nx is a new kind of game that challenges the limits of what you can do with a racket and ball in VR. 

The game features:
- 2 single player modes - a campaign and an endless runner!
- Versus & Co-op multiplayer supporting cross platform and multiple devices with the same user!
- A sick original soundtrack and the option to play your own music in game!

The game is played inside a giant glass dome, the walls of which light up with targets you must destroy with the ball.

But this is no ordinary ball!

Hit it with force and it will slam into the wall, rolling across it and bulldozing everything in its path!

Use your racket's tractor beam to pull it back, or simply to line up your next shot exactly where you want it. 

Be quick and plan your shots well. Learn to control the ball to perfection.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
v2.0.7:
- Fixed bug - in versus where game ends immediately after round 2 starts
- Fixed bug - in multiplayer where player loses a turn
- Fixed bug - double hit target when pulling the ball immediately upon impact, sometimes doesn't work
- Tweaked charge lane serve height

nodes.title: Co-op Update!
nodes.body_text:
Today we're rolled out a brand new game mode for Racket: Nx - Co-op!
Co-op lets you team up with a friend or stranger and play shoulder to shoulder for the high score in a game against time!
We expect a lot of new players to join and veteran players to pop back in, so please be nice and welcoming.

This is the biggest update to RNX since launch, and after playtesting it for several weeks now, we've found it to be a super fun and bonding experience.
As always, this mode can be played cross platform and between devices sharing the same account, so hopefully some of you will be able to play with your kids, spouses and arch-enemies.

In addition to Co-op mode, we've added a few game mechanics to Arcade, making it more dynamic and interesting. These additions change Arcade enough for us to have had to reset the leaderboards. Apologies. We do hope you find these new changes worth it, though!

Thank you all for sticking with us as we continue to develop and expand RNX!

nodes.title: Racket: Nx @ VAL Tournament
nodes.body_text: What can one do with a racket and ball in VR? Come and see Racket: Nx's top players fight for the VAL tournament championship! Aug 26th - Sep 5th. Links and updates @ vrfitsummit.com.

node.reviewDescription:
I bought this and thought I'd check it out quickly before going to work. An hour later I was dripping with sweat and had to force myself to stop (this hobby doesn't pay for itself!)

This takes tennis/table tennis/racquetball (whatever you're looking for) not just to the next level, but the next plane of existence. The lights, the sounds, the admiring awe in the announcer's voice ("DAYUUUUUUM"), I was immediately hooked. 

Then. Then I added my own music. Hitting a killer streak while your favorite song throbs in the background elevates this to a spiritual experience. 

Thank god you can swap hands, because the first night I played so much I could barely move my arm the next day, and I didn't want to take a day off. I will become ambidextrous for this game. 

My only suggestions for improvement would be more variety in the Zen visualizations, and in the same vein something more exciting when you clear a level, because successfully beating it and failing it look the same. Other than that, amazing work, devs!
